description: Try our easy to follow Breakfast Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pizza,High protein,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Low sugar,Sesame free
name: Breakfast Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook bacon for 3-4 minutes or until crispy. Add potato minis and cook for a further 2 minutes or until potato minis are slightly thawed.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Spread sauce on pizza base and place on tray. Top with bacon and potato minis, leaving a well in the centre for the egg. Top with cheese, then crack the egg in the centre.
Bake pizza for 20 minutes, or until potato minis are golden and egg is cooked. Sprinkle with chives, slice and serve immediately.
